languages.text: "Есть множество угроз и помимо еретических культов. Но ереси на Тассере уже достаточно".
"Heretical cults are not the only threat by far. But there is enough heresy on Thassera either way."
languages.original_text: "Есть множество угроз и помимо еретических культов. Но ереси на Тассере уже достаточно".

traits.locale_text: "Heretical cults are not the only threat by far. But there is enough heresy on Thassera as it is."
"Heretical cults are not the only threat by far. But there is enough heresy on Thassera as it is."
"Heretical cults are not the only threat by far. But there is enough heresy on Thassera as it is."
"Heretical cults are not the only threat by far. But there is enough heresy on Thassera as it is."
"Heretical cults are not the only threat by far. But there is enough heresy on Thassera either way."
"Heretical cults are not the only threat by far. But there is enough heresy on Thassera either way."

languages.text: "Ketzerische Kulte sind bei weitem nicht die einzige Gefahr. Aber auf Thassera gibt es ohne Zweifel genügend Ketzerei."
languages.original_text: "Heretical cults are not the only threat by far. But there is enough heresy on Thassera either way."

traits.locale_text: "Ketzerische Kulte sind bei weitem nicht die einzige Gefahr. Aber auf Thassera gibt es ohne Zweifel genügend Ketzerei."

languages.text: « Les sectes hérétiques ne sont pas la seule menace, loin de là, mais il est vrai que ce n'est pas l'hérésie qui manque sur Thassera. »
languages.original_text: "Heretical cults are not the only threat by far. But there is enough heresy on Thassera either way."

traits.locale_text: « Les sectes hérétiques ne sont pas la seule menace, loin de là, mais il est vrai que ce n'est pas l'hérésie qui manque sur Thassera. »

languages.text: 「異端の教団だけが脅威だというわけではまったくありません。ですがいずれにせよ、タッセーラには十分すぎるほどの異端が蔓延っています」
languages.original_text: "Heretical cults are not the only threat by far. But there is enough heresy on Thassera either way."

traits.locale_text: 「異端の教団だけが脅威だというわけではまったくありません。ですがいずれにせよ、タッセーラには十分すぎるほどの異端が蔓延っています」

languages.text: «Los cultos herejes no son la única amenaza ni por asomo, pero desde luego la herejía abunda en Thassera».
languages.original_text: "Heretical cults are not the only threat by far. But there is enough heresy on Thassera either way."

traits.locale_text: «Los cultos herejes no son la única amenaza ni por asomo, pero desde luego la herejía abunda en Thassera».

languages.text: “就目前看来，邪教恐怕并不是唯一的威胁。但无论事实如何，塔瑟拉的异端邪说确实非常严重。”
languages.original_text: "Heretical cults are not the only threat by far. But there is enough heresy on Thassera either way."

traits.locale_text: “就目前看来，邪教恐怕并不是唯一的威胁。但无论事实如何，塔瑟拉的异端邪说确实非常严重。”

languages.text: "Tek tehdit, kâfir tarikatlar değil. Thassera, hâlihazırda kâfirlikten geçilmiyor."
languages.original_text: "Heretical cults are not the only threat by far. But there is enough heresy on Thassera either way."

traits.locale_text: "Tek tehdit, kâfir tarikatlar değil. Thassera, hâlihazırda kâfirlikten geçilmiyor."
